sqlMap.select: SELECT A.NOTIFICATIONS_SEQ, A.CONTENT, B.NOTI_STATE_SEQ, C.members_seq, C.REC_SEQ FROM NOTIFICATIONS A, NOTIFICATIONS_STATE B, (SELECT email,NOTIFICATIONS_SEQ, e.members_seq, e.REC_SEQ FROM MEMBERS D,NOTIFICATIONS E WHERE D.MEMBERS_SEQ = E.REC_SEQ) C WHERE A.NOTI_STATE_SEQ = B.NOTI_STATE_SEQ AND C.email = #email# AND C.NOTIFICATIONS_SEQ = A.NOTIFICATIONS_SEQ AND A.SEEYN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.NOTIFICATIONS_SEQ DESC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO NOTIFICATIONS (NOTIFICATIONS_SEQ, BBS_SEQ, NOTI_STATE_SEQ, CONTENT, MEMBERS_SEQ, REC_SEQ) VALUES (NOTI_STATE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #bbs_seq#, '1', (SELECT SUBSTR(BBS_CONTENTS, 0, 10)||'...' FROM BBS WHERE BBS_SEQ=#bbs_seq# ), (SELECT MEMBERS_SEQ FROM MEMBERS WHERE EMAIL=#email# ) , (SELECT A.MEMBERS_SEQ FROM MEMBERS A, BBS B WHERE B.BBS_SEQ=#bbs_seq# AND A.EMAIL= B.REG_EMAIL) )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE NOTIFICATIONS SET SEEYN = 'N' WHERE NOTIFICATIONS_SEQ = #notifications_seq#
